main.controller

Class SuperSimpleStocksController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.controller.SuperSimpleStocksController

  • public class SuperSimpleStocksController
extends java.lang.Object
    The SuperSimpleStocksController acts as the marshaling point between the SuperSimpleStocksModel and SuperSimpleStocksView. System behavior is defined within this class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    andersarchibald

      • SuperSimpleStocksController

    • Method Detail

      • analyseStock

        public java.lang.String analyseStock(int selectionIndex,
                                     double tickerPrice)
        This method runs the following calculations for a selected stock: Dividend Yield, P/E Ration and Stock Price based on trades made in the last 15 minutes. The user must also have entered a ticker price for this to work.
        Parameters:
        selectionIndex - The index number of the selected stock.
        tickerPrice - The ticker price entered by the user.
        Returns:
        An analysis message for the stock.

      • tradeStock

        public java.lang.String tradeStock(int selectionIndex,
                                   int quantity,
                                   double price,
                                   TradeType tradeType)
        This method executes a stock trade, based upon the stock selected, the quantity of stocks, the stock price entered and the type of trade (BUY or SELL).
        Parameters:
        selectionIndex - This is the selection index of the stock to be traded.
        quantity - The number of stocks to be traded.
        price - The price of the trade.
        tradeType - The trade type BUY or SELL.
        Returns:
        Trade completion message.

      • getAllTrades

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllTrades()
        Returns:
        All trade records as a collection of strings

      • allShareIndex

        public java.lang.String allShareIndex()
        Method used to execute the GBCE all share index calculation.
        Returns:
        The GBCE All Share index value is returned.

      • getStockSymbols

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStockSymbols()

      • getSymbolForStock
